title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using the dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tag, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tag, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the content type does not have any effect.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a database field with the mentioned types of content. 2. Use the dynamic text element to display the contents of the field. 3. Observe that the content type does not have any effect on the displayed content.
